#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
	int T;
	cin>>T;
	while (T--)
	{
		string s;
		cin>>s;
		//o and n counts
		pair<int,int> counts[s.length()];
		if (s[0] == 'O')
			counts[0].first = 1;
		else
			counts[0].second = 1;
		for (int i = 1; i < s.length(); ++i)
		{
			counts[i] = counts[i-1];
			if (s[i] == 'O') ++counts[i].first;
			else ++counts[i].second;
		
		//	cerr<<counts[i].first<<" "<<counts[i].second<<endl;
		}
		pair<int,int> last = counts[s.length() - 1];
		int ans = min(last.first, last.second);

		for (int i = 0; i < s.length()-1; ++i)
		{
			int temp = counts[i].second + last.first - counts[i+1].first;
		//cerr<<temp<<"\n";
			ans = min(ans, temp);
		}

		cout<<ans<<"\n";
	}
}
